## ExtrusionFeatureParameters.zFightingWorkaround property

Enable z-fighting workaround that doesn't animate buildings with `height < [[ExtrusionFeatureDefs.MIN_BUILDING_HEIGHT]]`<!-- -->.

Should be applied to `polygon` materials using this feature.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
zFightingWorkaround?: boolean;
```
